description:
The Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) Flashcard app for Palm webOS is Upward Mobility’s focused vocabulary review app for the CISSP Exam, as regulated by the International Information Systems Security Certification Consortium (ISC). This module contains 350 essential terms for the CISSP certification exam.  each flash card contains a key term of concept in one of ten core CISSP knowledge areas: application security,
access control, business continuity and disaster recovery, risk management and information security, cryptography, environmental security, operations security, legal issues,
network security and telecommunications, and security systems design.  ||  All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process.  ||  Our flash card app has simple, intuitive navigation, with the ability to shuffle cards, to remove flash cards from the deck, and to reset the deck.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
